Digital market research that generates impact for global brands

Debora Nitta - Head of Planning at WMcCann

“During the whole project, the MindMiners team demonstrated extreme partnership, agility, quality and exceptional speed in obtaining results. They have become a very important partner for future projects at Coca Cola.

Patricia Manso - Knowledge & Insights Junior Manager at Coca Cola

“Simplicity, objectiveness and results are part of MindMiners’ DNA, in a world where finding adequate solutions that are easy to implement is almost an impossible mission. MindMiners unites the necessity of obtaining data to a practical solution. Now, small companies, or the ones that did not believe they had the resources to understand their consumers, have a viable option at the palm of their hands. Welcome, MindMiners. We were waiting for you for a long time.”

Zilla Patrícia Bendit - Business Administration Doctor and Professor at Fundação Getúlio Vargas

“I have used several market research platforms, high and low quality ones, to help me reach solid decisions. In my opinion, what sets MindMiners apart is the fact that the team is immersed in the subject of research, resulting in recommendations and conclusioins that are both practical and objetive.”

Martim Ibrahim Bernardara - Product and Marketing Director at M.Dias Branco

“I got to know MindMiners through a close friend of mine who works in the market. He explained to me how this technology company could, in a easy, economic and fast way answer everyday business questions. I decided to work with them and the experience was truly positive. I had a simple, straightforward question, that would direct my promotion strategy at the point of sales and MindMiners helped me obtain the answers I needed in a fast, simple and economic way, just like they promised. Furthermore, because of the online methodology, I was able to track the results in real time and when I needed assistance to analyze the complete results I was very well served by the research analyst who helped me with the interpretation of the data.”

Vicente Jabur - Junior Research Manager at Danone

“Our partnership with MindMiners began due to a need of evaluating consumers in a faster and trustworthy way. We currently live in a fluid society, which means it is necessary that we make agile decisions, but always making sure we feel our cusumer’s pulse rate. The partnership has contributed highly to the direction of our marketing strategies, not only through validation but especially by helping us build knowledge.”

Caio Takeshi Yuki Tanizaki - Senior CMI Analyst at Nestlé

“I have worked with MindMiners for just over one year now. And during this time we have already completed more than 10 projects together. This was possible because of the tool, that is able to deliver one of the things that our market lacks the most: agility. In a scenario where we need to make fast and precise decisions, they assist me with the client, with internal marketing demands, with bigger projects for which I need to know the consumer’s perception and feeling. This agility, together with a real time platform and a very competent professional team, makes MindMiners one of our major research partners here at the agency.”

Fabrício Natoli - Director of Planning at Mood/TBWA
